# Generated by binpac_quickstart

project(Bro-Plugin-OWAMP)

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

# BRO_CONFIG_PREFIX
if ( NOT BRO_DIST AND NOT BRO_CONFIG_PREFIX )
    message(FATAL_ERROR "Neither BRO_DIST nor BRO_CONFIG_PREFIX are set")
endif ()

set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${BRO_DIST}/cmake)

include(BroPlugin)

bro_plugin_begin(PerfSONAR OWAMP)
bro_plugin_cc(src/Plugin.cc)
bro_plugin_cc(src/OWAMP.cc)
bro_plugin_bif(src/events.bif)
bro_plugin_pac(src/owamp.pac src/owamp-analyzer.pac src/owamp-protocol.pac)
bro_plugin_end()
